modName: Skyrim Top Trumps - The Print Your Own Pack PDF
summary:
The Perfect Christmas Present for any Skyrim Addict.
<br />Too mean to go down to the shops and buy a proper present for your loved ones?
<br />Then this is just what you've been looking for...
<br />SKYRIM TOP TRUMPS - The "Print Your Own Pack" PDF
<br />Simply download this handy PDF an
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VaJs9BO.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MagsddA.png[/IMG][/center]
[size=2]As I laboured over the Skyrim Tops Trumps Series, some people suggested[color=pink][b][i]... It would be great if we could have all these playing cards in the game as a mod?[/color][/b][/i] And as always I replied[color=pink][b][i]... Sorry, I am simply not that clever. [/color][/b][/i]
However, we can give you them as a PDF. Now I could have laboured on this myself of course, but there is a fella on here who puts me to shame on editorial creativity and so [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550]MapleVolt[/url] kindly agreed to create this wonderful PDF for you.

We Hope your enjoy it, and have a [/size] [color=white][b][size=4] Merry Christmas from Reimar67 & MapleVolt. [/color][/b] [/size]

[size=2]If you want to preview the set, take a look at the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/296113]Skyrim Top Trumps Series[/url]. But make sure you come back to get the full set for yourself here.

[color=yellow][b]HOW TO USE [/color][/b]
It is a PDF. So just download and print. Simple (just like me).

[color=yellow][b]VERSION HISTORY[/color][/b]
Version 1 - In PDF format and no intentions to change.

[color=yellow][b]THANKS TO... [/color][/b]
The massively talented [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937550]MapleVolt[/url] for his work on the PDF and the creative input over the last few weeks. A real pleasure to work with (and very patient).
And of course, Bethesda, for an excellent addition to TES series

If you see any mistakes, catch me in Skyrim Nexus at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/545970]Reimar67[/url] [/size]

[color=yellow][b]NEW!!! [/color][/b]
You can have the [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49053] IN GAME Top Trumps Collectors Cards[/url][/b], thanks to the amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1398716]IceBurg[/url].
author: Reimar67 and MapleVolt
